coverLetter: I am excited to apply for the Senior Frontend Developer position at TechFlow Solutions. With my 5+ years of experience in React and TypeScript, I believe I would be a great fit for your team.
I am interested in the UX/UI Designer position and believe my frontend development background would bring valuable technical insights to the design process.
While my experience is primarily in frontend development, I have significant experience with Node.js and backend technologies that would make me a strong candidate for this role.
